artist: Painter: After Francesco Raibolini Francia; Delineator: Giuseppe Guizzardi; Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina
description: Virgin and Child at center on a throne with a musician angel at their feet; to the left Saints John the Baptist, Monica, and Augustine; to the right kneeling donor and Saints Sebastian, Francis, and Proculus
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

below image in black: F. Raibolini detto Francia   G. Guizzardi dis.   Giuseppe Rosaspina inc. / B.V. COL BAMBINO, SANTE AGOSTINO, FRANCESCO, GIO BATTISTA, MONICA VITALE, E IL RITRATTO DI BARTOLOMEO FELICINI | on sheet in pencil: See Raibolini / 2-263
title: Blessed Virgin with Child, Saints Augustine, Francis, John the Baptist, Monica, and donor Bartolomeo Felicini
